channel.description: The top News headlines from The Sydney Morning Herald. For all the news, visit https://www.smh.com.au
channel.title: Sydney Morning Herald - Latest News

item.dc:creator: Roy Ward
item.description: It's Super Tuesday, of sorts. A mid-week round 15 special. Today's action begins with Hawthorn v Adelaide from the Adelaide Oval.
item.title: AFL 2020 Round 15 live updates: Essendon chases win over Eagles as Crows humble Hawks

item.dc:creator: Matt Dennien
item.description: The decision will leave the party with less than two months to preselect a new candidate to replace Clayfield candidate John Meyer ahead of the looming October poll.
item.title: Greens drop candidate for inner Brisbane seat

item.dc:creator: Matt Bungard
item.description: NSW is set to extend its border zone to a 50 kilometre radius on Friday after Victoria recorded just 70 new cases and five deaths today. There were 13 new cases in NSW overnight.
item.title: Coronavirus updates LIVE: Victoria records just 70 cases; restrictions to be loosened on NSW-Victoria border; Australian death toll hits 657

item.dc:creator: Latika Bourke
item.description: The former PM took a swipe at Victorian Premier Daniel Andrews over Melbourne's stage four restrictions.
item.title: 'Unaccountable experts': Tony Abbott calls for end to lockdowns, travel bans

item.description: While avian types don't mince their words.
item.title: Washing instructions. It's all there in black and white

item.description: There's been a dramatic drop in the use of methamphetamine in Western Australia as drug smugglers struggle to get past the state's hard border, and now there's a warning addicts are turning to a deadly alternative - homebake heroin.
item.title: 'Homebake heroin': How COVID-19 has turned WA's drug market upside down

item.dc:creator: Matthew Pavlich
item.description: To anyone that has seen stars after a big hit, or woken up in the changerooms not knowing what has just happened and thought, “how did I get here?” – recent news makes you sit up and take notice.
item.title: The cost of on-field bravery: How I hope to help science understand CTE

item.description: Adelaide snapped a 16-game losing streak and avoided the ignominy of becoming the first AFL/VFL team to endure a winless season since Fitzroy in 1964 after notching a convincing triumph over Hawthorn.
item.title: Crows topple Hawks to end winless drought

item.dc:creator: Matt Dennien
item.description: Senior Constable Neil Punchard has been ordered to complete 140 hours of community service after appealing his earlier sentence and convictions as excessive.
item.title: Court overturns conviction for police officer who leaked DV survivor details

item.dc:creator: Erin Pearson
item.description: The force has admitted it was 'profoundly wrong' in allowing Nicola Gobbo to inform on her own clients. It comes as the Lawyer X royal commission releases 3000 pages of documents for the first time.
item.title: Police say using Lawyer X as informer was wrong, issue bombshell apology for 'breaching trust'

item.dc:creator: Lucy Stone
item.description: The council moved to give Lamb House's owner three months to pay an outstanding rates bill of more than $300,000 or the heritage-listed site would be auctioned to the highest bidder.
item.title: Labor questions Lamb House sale process

item.dc:creator: Clive Hamilton
item.description: Cheng is not a well-known Australian and has worked for many years as part of the Communist Party's propaganda apparatus.
item.title: Cheng Lei is a strange choice for a diplomatic hostage

item.dc:creator: Michael Chammas
item.description: Benji Marshall’s sudden departure from the Wests Tigers has torn the scab off a wound that has been festering at the club for the last two seasons under coach Michael Maguire.
item.title: Inside the Wests Tigers drama: why Maguire is losing the dressing room

item.dc:creator: Sumeyya Ilanbey
item.description: The Victorian government has warned that some businesses may still not be able to reopen once stage four restrictions are lifted.
item.title: Businesses face staggered reopening as restrictions ease

item.dc:creator: Jordan Baker
item.description: Since the pandemic struck, more than 17,000 students have missed out on their graduations.
item.title: Thousands of students to graduate from their living room

item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Knight
item.description: Insurance giant QBE's chairman Mike Wilkins is facing a barrage of questions from shareholders, who want to know why the board has shown CEO Pat Regan the door.
item.title: QBE boss skewered by his own conduct code

item.dc:creator: Phil Lutton
item.description: The official word is "no timeline" but Brisbane officials know they must have a coach in place and settled if they are to make any serious market moves.
item.title: Clock ticking on Broncos' coach hunt as club looks to player market

item.dc:creator: Peter Ryan
item.description: Clubs are monitoring the situation with Giants forward Jeremy Finlayson closely after the emergence of Jake Riccardi in recent weeks.
item.title: Finlayson shapes as trade target

item.dc:creator: Michael Lallo
item.description: A disagreement over redundancy entitlements has prompted the Media Entertainment and Arts Alliance to lodge a dispute with the Fair Work Commission.
item.title: ABC in fresh pay dispute as union lodges Fair Work action

item.dc:creator: Sarah Keoghan
item.description: The pressure of facing the Vixens seemed too much for coach Julie Fitzgerald, who once again opted for two-point shooting duo Kiera Austin and Jo Harten over Caitlin Bassett.
item.title: Giants prove old habits die hard as Vixens dominate with one-point game

item.dc:creator: Laura Chung
item.description: A neighbour was making dinner when he heard two gunshots, which he thought were fireworks.
item.title: 'I heard help, help': four men on the run after shooting in Sydney's west

item.description: They are the faces of everyday rebellion: a woman who goes walking with her mask stashed under her chin, a man who warns of the loss of his human rights. Many are on an emotional knife edge.
item.title: On the edge: the psychology of the COVID rule-breakers

item.description: This week the critics discuss The Bachelor, The Block, Plate of Origin and Back in Time for Dinner.
item.title: 'Good casting, conflict': Dissecting the fresh batch of reality TV shows

item.description: In his book Confessions Of A Lighthouse Keeper, Greg Appel documents a unique period in Sydney's indie music scene.
item.title: Keeping the flame alive for The Lighthouse Keepers

item.dc:creator: Shane Wright
item.description: The RBA surprised markets by offering banks up to $200b in cheap cash to help the economy out of worst recession since the end of World War II.
item.title: Banks offered cheap $200b to help build economy out of recession

item.dc:creator: Chip Le Grand
item.description: The royal commission has identified 124 criminal convictions tainted by the double life of Nicola Gobbo that may be set aside.
item.title: Former top cop slammed in Lawyer X royal commission

item.dc:creator: Michael Gleeson
item.description: The 2020 AFL grand final will be held at the Gabba as a twilight or night game on October 24.
item.title: Gabba it is for AFL's grandest occasion

item.dc:creator: Timna Jacks
item.description: Massive amounts of soil being dug up to build the $6.7 billion West Gate Tunnel will exceed Victoria’s landfill capacity, forcing controversial landfill expansions in Melbourne's north and west.
item.title: West Gate Tunnel dig forces controversial landfill expansion

item.dc:creator: Jordan Baker
item.description: Vice-chancellor Michael Spence flagged job cuts, but stopped short of saying how many will be lost as the hit to international student revenue continues.
item.title: Sydney University boss takes 20 per cent pay cut as job cuts announced

item.dc:creator: Matt Bungard
item.description: Detectives, with assistance from NSW Police's tactical operations unit, arrested three men at a house in West Ryde just after 12.30pm on Tuesday.
item.title: Cocaine and cash seized; three men arrested in western Sydney

item.dc:creator: Noel Towell
item.description: A Greens MP's surprise return to Parliament gives the Premier the votes he needs while regional mayors want a safety-first approach to opening up the state.
item.title: Regional mayors worried as Premier prepares to lift Melbourne travel restrictions

item.dc:creator: Martin Boulton
item.description: The 49th iteration of the festival, which brings about 50,000 people and $50 million to the regional NSW town, is unlikely to proceed.
item.title: 'A severe curve ball': Tamworth Country Music Festival set to be cancelled

item.dc:creator: Toby Crockford
item.description: Queensland police are investigating an alleged border breach involving notorious former Queensland bikie Shane Bowden who was nabbed at the Brisbane Airport.
item.title: Qld Health, Victorian CHO say 'Ballroom Blitz' bikie not infectious while travelling

item.dc:creator: Dana McCauley
item.description: The medicines regulator is seeking feedback on a proposal to legalise the active ingredients in ecstasy pills and magic mushrooms for mental health treatment.
item.title: Regulator weighs push to legalise MDMA for mental health treatment

item.dc:creator: John McDuling
item.description: Banning genuine news produced by reputable media outlets will only worsen the misinformation epidemic Facebook has created.
item.title: Facebook's threat would only worsen the misinformation epidemic it created

item.dc:creator: Nick Bonyhady
item.description: The ridesharing giant is facing the threat of regulation in Victoria, but wants the issue handled nationally.
item.title: Uber tells states regulating the gig economy is not their domain

item.dc:creator: Anthony Galloway
item.description: New laws to more easily strip Australian terrorists of their citizenship could be passed before the end of the week under a deal between Labor and the Morrison government.
item.title: Home Affairs minister to get power to strip terrorists' citizenship

item.dc:creator: Angus Thompson
item.description: NSW Environment Minister Matt Kean said the property was part of an area that was home to some of the state's healthiest koala populations.
item.title: Historical Sydney estate heritage-listed to help preserve koala population

item.dc:creator: Mike Foley
item.description: The endangered smoky mouse is set to remain on the list of endangered native wildlife, with the Black Summer bushfires halting recent advances in its population size.
item.title: Bushfires torch conservation gains for endangered native animals

item.dc:creator: Jennifer Duke
item.description: The former Treasury secretary says while deferring the rise is possible and has happened before, he does not support a delay.
item.title: 'Allow the increases to go through': Henry backs super guarantee rise

item.dc:creator: Georgina Mitchell
item.description: Two men accused of being involved in the killing should be found not guilty, their barristers have said in closing remarks in the NSW Supreme Court on Tuesday.
item.title: 'Pretty slick operation': Accused men not involved in Hawi murder, jury told

item.dc:creator: Roy Ward
item.description: Melbourne Storm have re-signed three key depth players for next season.
item.title: Melbourne Storm re-sign key depth players for 2021

item.dc:creator: Roy Ward
item.description: Reece Hodge knows his side will need no extra motivation this week as they look to secure their first-ever finals berth with a win over Western Force on Saturday.
item.title: 'It would mean everything to us': Rebels set sights on first finals appearance

item.dc:creator: Natassia Chrysanthos
item.description: When schools first transitioned to remote learning, experts warned the longer lockdown went on, the more likely it was students would slip out of the education system.
item.title: Thousands of NSW students never returned to school after lockdown

item.dc:creator: Patrick Hatch
item.description: Crown Resorts staff compromised the casino's anti-money laundering program by recording multiple large cash deposits from patrons as a single transaction.
item.title: Crown's cash records compromised money laundering checks, inquiry told

item.dc:creator: Christian Nicolussi
item.description: Corey Allan was named on the wing but expected to start at fullback for Souths as they try to maintain momentum towards the finals without Latrell Mitchell.
item.title: 'Social loafer' Allan entrusted with Latrell's tough gig for Souths

item.dc:creator: Sam Phillips
item.description: The Australian leg of the World Series Sevens tournament will not be played in 2021 due to the impact of the coronavirus pandemic.
item.title: Sydney sevens cancelled as World Rugby invest $2.5m in Olympic funding

item.dc:creator: Clancy Yeates
item.description: The shock exit of QBE boss Pat Regan after a complaint from a female employee over inappropriate communication has sparked criticism from a key investor.
item.title: QBE chief Pat Regan in shock exit after complaint by female employee

item.dc:creator: The Herald's View
item.description: Stability and predictability in Japan are even more important as Australia attempts to counterbalance Chinese power in our region.
item.title: Japan's success in post-Abe era is in Australia's interests

item.dc:creator: Sam Phillips
item.description: The teen prodigy will not play for King's again this season as Souths continue to firm as his likely destination.
item.title: Suaalii to sit out entire GPS season as Souths firm as likely destination
